author: James Melville
title: Do try this at home: how one Italian town fought coronavirus
description: The evidence is clear: Mass testing for the virus is the key to its eradication â€“ and to saving lives.
content:
Cases of the coronavirus in Italy have continued to soar in recent weeks. The country has reported 86,498 cases and 9,134 deaths as of Saturday, March 28.
But one small Italian town claims to have eradicated coronavirus infections, having now reached zero ne… [+5490 chars]
